title: What if there was a (health) regen item that healed based off missing health?
body: Maybe there's an item I'm forgetting about, but I'm pretty sure most items just give flat health regen. What if instead of flat regen there was an item that healed based on how low your hp was? Higher regen if your hp is lower than a certain percent, and normal regen if your hp is higher than that percent. The exact numbers Riot can decide.

replies.body: Originally Spirit Visage did that and I thought it was really fun. They remade it during beta instead of tuning it. :(

I honestly like the idea but doesnt warmogs lowkey do that? With lower health health regen spikes to 200% and normally its 100%. I'd like to see more variety in health regen items though. Right now its just Spirit Visage and Warmogs :/

Well, either it would have a decent gold efficiency on its base stats and everybody would buy it, or it would have shit gold efficiency and nobody would buy it.

As far as how it would work in game, the people buying it would be doing so with the idea that if they start losing trades it will pull them through allowing them to eventually win, likely causing many people to die because they are staying in lane with low health, unless the item did its job so well that it could actually facilitate that.
